channel.title: possible Problems on Spacehuhn Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in possible Problems on Spacehuhn Wiki

item.title: Deauth-Attack not working
item.description: Here are some possible reasons: maybe the device connects too fast, try increasing the pkts/s in the settings maybe the network is 5ghz, the ESP can only do 2.4ghz maybe 802.11w standart alias protected management frames are activated on your network,this means you can’t fake them and your network is safe against deauth attacks  I have a question  Suggest changes  Source
